trans-unit.source: DSC Archive Resource
powershell,DSC
DSC Archive Resource
Applies To: Windows PowerShell 4.0, Windows PowerShell 5.0
The Archive resource in Windows PowerShell Desired State Configuration (DSC) provides a mechanism to unpack archive (.zip) files at a specific path.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 預期狀態設定 (DSC) 的封存資源會提供一個機制，將封存 (.zip) 檔案解壓縮在特定路徑。

trans-unit.source: Syntax
Properties
Property
Description
Destination
Specifies the location where you want to ensure the archive contents are extracted.
trans-unit.target: 指定您想要確保的封存內容解壓縮位置。

trans-unit.source: Path
Specifies the source path of the archive file.
trans-unit.target: 指定封存檔案的來源路徑。

trans-unit.source: Checksum
Defines the type to use when determining whether two files are the same.
trans-unit.target: 定義判斷兩個檔案是否相同時所使用的類型。

trans-unit.source: If __Checksum__ is not specified, only the file or directory name is used for comparison.
trans-unit.target: 如不指定 __Checksum__，只會使用檔案或目錄名稱進行比較。

trans-unit.source: Valid values include: SHA-1, SHA-256, SHA-512, createdDate, modifiedDate, none (default).
If you specify __Checksum__ without __Validate__, the configuration will fail.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定 __Checksum__ 但無 __Validate__，設定會失敗。

trans-unit.source: Ensure
Determines whether to check if the content of the archive exists at the __Destination__.
trans-unit.target: 當__目的地__有封存內容時，決定是否要檢查。

trans-unit.source: Set this property to __Present__ to ensure the contents exist.
trans-unit.target: 請將這個屬性設為 __Present__ 以確保有內容。

trans-unit.source: Set it to __Absent__ to ensure they do not exist.
trans-unit.target: 設為 __Absent__ 以確保它們不存在。

trans-unit.source: The default value is __Present__.
DependsOn
Indicates that the configuration of another resource must run before this resource is configured.
trans-unit.target: 表示必須先執行另一個資源的設定，再設定這個資源。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the ID of the resource configuration script block that you want to run first is ResourceName and its type is __ResourceType__, the syntax for using this property is `DependsOn = "[ResourceType]ResourceName"`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果第一個想要執行的資源設定指令碼區塊的識別碼是 ResourceName，而它的類型是 __ResourceType__，則使用這個屬性的語法就是 `DependsOn = "[ResourceType]ResourceName"`。

trans-unit.source: Validate
Uses the Checksum property to determine if the archive matches the signature.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Checksum 屬性判斷封存是否符合簽章。

trans-unit.source: If you specify Checksum without Validate, the configuration will fail.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定 Checksum 但無 Validate，設定會失敗。

trans-unit.source: If you specify Validate without Checksum, a SHA-256 checksum is used by default.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定 Validate 但無 Checksum，預設使用 SHA-256 總和檢查碼。

trans-unit.source: Force
Certain file operations (such as overwriting a file or deleting a directory that is not empty) will result in an error.
trans-unit.target: 某些檔案作業 (例如覆寫檔案，或刪除不是空的目錄) 會導致錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Using the Force property overrides such errors.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Force 屬性會覆寫此類錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The default value is False.
Example
The following example shows how to use the Archive resource to ensure that the contents of an archive file called Test.zip exist and are extracted at a given destination.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用封存資源以確保 Test.zip 封存檔案的內容存在，並會解壓縮在指定的目的地。
